DOC.brief_summary: This study test effect XAF5 Gel ( apply skin night 6 week ) excess submental fat , also know double chin . The study also assess safety tolerability XAF5 Gel .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Feasibility Study XAF5 Gel Reduction Submental Fat
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( paraphrase ) : Adult men woman Must understand provide inform consent Moderate submental fat ( determined clinician ) No laxity ( looseness ) minimal laxity submental skin Healthy skin upon skin reaction would visible Exclusion Criteria ( paraphrase ) : A clinically significant health problem recent illness A clinically significant abnormal result physical exam laboratory test Neck facial hair would interfere apply study drug submental skin Clinically significant skin disease Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > = 40 Plan begin diet weight loss regimen study
